Self.Wiki: Determines the hitbox and damage parameters for attacks.

hit0_Radius.Wiki: Determines the radius of the hitbox (sphere/capsule).

hit1_Radius.Wiki: Determines the radius of the hitbox (sphere/capsule).

hit2_Radius.Wiki: Determines the radius of the hitbox (sphere/capsule).

hit3_Radius.Wiki: Determines the radius of the hitbox (sphere/capsule).

knockbackDist.Wiki: Determines the distance the victim is knocked back by. In metres per second.

hitStopTime.Wiki: The duration that the victim's animations are paused for when hit. In seconds.

spEffectId0.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied to victim by this attack.

spEffectId1.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied to victim by this attack.

spEffectId2.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied to victim by this attack.

spEffectId3.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied to victim by this attack.

spEffectId4.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied to victim by this attack.

hit0_DmyPoly1.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tip of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

hit1_DmyPoly1.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tip of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

hit2_DmyPoly1.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tip of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

hit3_DmyPoly1.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tip of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

hit0_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tail of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

hit1_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tail of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

hit2_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tail of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

hit3_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to place the sphere hitbox, or the tail of the capsule hitbox, for this hit.

blowingCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base blow-off value.

atkPhysCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base Physical attack value.

atkMagCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base Magic attack value.

atkFireCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base Fire attack value.

atkThunCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base Lightning attack value.

atkStamCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base stamina attack value.

guardAtkRateCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base guard attack value. Compared against the deflection defense value to determine if the attack will bounce.

guardBreakCorrection.Wiki: Player only. The multiplier to the base guard defense value. Compared against the deflection attack value to determine if the attack will bounce.

atkThrowEscapeCorrection.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the base throw attack value.

atkSuperArmorCorrection.Wiki: Player only. The multiplier to apply to the base poise attack value.

atkPhys.Wiki: The base Physical attack value. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

atkMag.Wiki: The base Magic attack value. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

atkFire.Wiki: The base Fire attack value. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

atkThun.Wiki: The base Lightning attack value. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

guardAtkRate.Wiki: The base guard attack value. Compared against the guard defense value to determine if the attack will bounce.

guardBreakRate.Wiki: The base guard defense value. Compared against the guard attack value to determine if the attack will bounce.

atkObj.Wiki: The base object destruction value. Applied to the object's HP.

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the reduction of stamina damage when guarding. Positive values increase guard stability, negative values decrease it.

guardRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the guard absorption value from the weapon. 0, 1x / 100, 2x / -100, guard multiplier = (guard multiplier / 100) to increase / decrease the parameter to 0. + 1)

throwTypeId.Wiki: The throw type ID to use with this attack against the victim.

hit0_hitType.Wiki: The hit collision type for this hit slot.

hit1_hitType.Wiki: The hit collision type for this hit slot.

hit2_hitType.Wiki: The hit collision type for this hit slot.

hit3_hitType.Wiki: The hit collision type for this hit slot.

hti0_Priority.Wiki: The priority for this hit slot. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hti1_Priority.Wiki: The priority for this hit slot. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hti2_Priority.Wiki: The priority for this hit slot. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hti3_Priority.Wiki: The priority for this hit slot. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

dmgLevel.Wiki: The damage animation to apply to the victim of this attack.

mapHitType.Wiki: Which map do you see around the attack? The set

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: Guard cut rate invalidation ratio (-100 to 100) Normal at 0 / Completely invalidated at -100 / Doubles the defense effect of the opponent at 100 -50, 100% cut shield becomes 50% cut Become

atkAttribute.Wiki: Attack attribute to use when applying attack against the victim.

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to use when applying attack against the victim.

atkType.Wiki: Specify the particles and sounds at the time of attack (1 set by attribute, material, size).

atkMaterial.Wiki: Specify the particles and sounds at the time of attack (1 set by attribute, material, size).

atkSize.Wiki: Specify particles and sounds at the time of attack (Although it is reserved, it is used, so be sure to set it blank or small).

defMaterial.Wiki: Specify the particles and sounds when guarding against this attack. (1 set by attribute, material, size).

defSfxMaterial.Wiki: The particles used when guarding against this attack.

hitSourceType.Wiki: The source of the dummy Polygon ID to use for this attack.

throwFlag.Wiki: The flag used to determine the throwing parameters for this attack.

disableGuard.Wiki: If ON, then this attack ignores the victim's guard and applies the damage animation automatically.

disableStaminaAttack.Wiki: If ON, then this attack will not reduce the victim's stamina as a result of them guarding the attack.

disableHitSpEffect.Wiki: If ON, then this attack will not apply on-hit SpEffects to the victim.

IgnoreNotifyMissSwingForAI.Wiki: If ON, then the enemy AI is not given notification of a missed attack.

repeatHitSfx.Wiki: If ON, does the on-hit SFX for this attack repeat forever upon collision.

isArrowAtk.Wiki: If ON, then this attack will count as damage to a destructable enemy part.

isGhostAtk.Wiki: If ON, then this attack will count as damage to a ghost enemy.

isDisableNoDamage.Wiki: If ON, then invulnerability frames (such as roll frames) are ignored by this attack. Complete invulnerability is NOT ignored however.
